column4: On Rosh \d{H}odesh, read the Maftir and Haftarah on page \pageref{maft_ShabRCh}.
On Erev Rosh d\{H}odesh, read the Haftarah on page \pageref{haft_macharchodesh}.
On Rosh \d{H}odesh, read the Maftir and Haftarah on page \pageref{maft_ShabRCh}.

On Shabbat Shekalim, Maftir is Exodus 30:11-16, and the Haftarah is the special Haftarah on page \pageref{haft_shekalim}.  When Shabbat Shekalim is Rosh \d{H}odesh, read as before but combine the 6th and 7th aliyot from the parsha, and read the 7th aliya for Shabbat Rosh \d{H}odesh on page \pageref{maft_ShabRCh}.  On Rosh \d{H}odesh that is not Shabbat Shekalim, the Maftir and Haftarah are on page \pageref{maft_ShabRCh}.  On Erev Rosh \d{H}odesh that is not Shabbat Shekalim, read the Haftarah on page \pageref{haft_macharchodesh}

On Shabbat Shekalim, Maftir is Exodus 30:11-16, and the Haftarah is the special Haftarah on page \pageref{haft_shekalim}.  When Shabbat Shekalim is Rosh \d{H}odesh, read as before but combine the 6th and 7th aliyot from the parsha, and read the 7th aliya for Shabbat Rosh \d{H}odesh on page \pageref{maft_ShabRCh}.  For Shabbat Zachor the maftir and haftarah are on page \pageref{maft_zachor}.  On Rosh \d{H}odesh that is not Shabbat Shekalim, the Maftir and Haftarah are on page \pageref{maft_ShabRCh}.
For Shabbat Zachor the maftir and haftarah are on page \pageref{maft_zachor}.
On Shabbat Parah, read Maftir and Haftarah on page \pageref{maft_parah}.

On Shabbat Shekalim, Maftir is Exodus 30:11-16, and the Haftarah is the special Haftarah on page \pageref{haft_shekalim}. On Shabbat Parah, read Maftir and Haftarah on page \pageref{maft_parah}. On Shabbat Ha\d{H}odesh, Maftir is Exodus 12:1-20, and the Haftarah is on page \pageref{haft_hachodesh}.

On Shabbat Shekalim, Maftir is Exodus 30:11-16, and the Haftarah is the special Haftarah on page \pageref{haft_shekalim}. On Shabbat Parah, read Maftir and Haftarah on page \pageref{maft_parah}. On Shabbat Ha\d{H}odesh, Maftir is Exodus 12:1-20, and the Haftarah is on page \pageref{haft_hachodesh}.
For Shabbat Zachor the maftir and haftarah are on page \pageref{maft_zachor}.  On Shabbat Ha\d{H}odesh read the Maftir and Haftarah on page \pageref{maft_hachodesh}.

For Shabbat Zachor the maftir and haftarah are on page \pageref{maft_zachor}. On Shabbat Parah, read Maftir and Haftarah on page \pageref{maft_parah}.  On the Shabbat before Pesa\d{h}, read the Haftarah on page \pageref{haft_hagadol}.

For Shabbat Ha\d{H}odesh the Maftir and Haftarah are on page \pageref{maft_hachodesh}.

On the Shabbat before Pesa\d{h}, read the Haftarah on page \pageref{haft_hagadol}. On Rosh \d{H}odesh, read the Maftir and Haftarah on page \pageref{maft_ShabRCh}. On Erev Rosh d\{H}odesh, read the Haftarah on page \pageref{haft_macharchodesh}.
